summary:
$Spike - $Spike is the original. the first documented matt furie drawing ever created.

 ABOUT - Matt Furie Artwork and Inspiration SPIKE is the first art made by Matt Furie (The creator of $PEPE) in 1984, If you haven't heard about Spike yet, where ya been? Spike isn't just your average meme, he's the first!

 how to buy - Create a Wallet download metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io. Get some eth have ETH in your wallet to switch to $Spike. If you don’t have any ETH, you can buy directly on metamask, transfer from another wallet, or buy on another exchange and send it to your wallet. Go to Uniswap connect to Uniswap. Go to app.uniswap.org in google chrome or on the browser inside your Metamask app. Connect your wallet. Paste the $Spike token address into Uniswap, select Pepe, and confirm. When Metamask prompts you for a wallet signature, sign Switch ETH for $Spike switch ETH for $Spike. We have ZERO taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.

 tokenomics - Token Supply: 420,690,000 No Taxes, No Bullshit. It’s that simple. LP tokens are burnt, and contract ownership is renounced.

 roadmap - Phase 1: Meme Phase 2: Vibe and HODL Phase 3: Meme Takeover © 2024 by $Spike. All rights reserved!
